issues_found.description: Missing filter functionality requirement - Research identified 'filter_button' as required design element from reference image 18-gantt-timeline.png, but spec did not include filter functionality in requirements or implementation
issues_found.location: Functional Requirements section, Implementation Checklist Phase 5, Success Criteria, QA Sign-off
issues_found.fix_applied: Added functional requirement #7 for Filter Functionality with acceptance criteria. Added filter implementation steps to Phase 5 checklist (filter dropdown button using MUI Menu, filter logic). Added filter verification to Success Criteria (#8-9) and QA Sign-off requirements. Updated Material-UI imports to include Menu and MenuItem components.

issues_found.description: Import statement not explicit - Spec mentioned importing library but didn't show actual import statement. Research shows correct imports are: 'import { Gantt, Task, ViewMode } from "gantt-task-react";'
issues_found.location: Implementation Notes DO section (line 150), Phase 3 checklist (line 267)
issues_found.fix_applied: Added explicit import statement to DO section: 'import { Gantt, Task, ViewMode } from "gantt-task-react";' before CSS import. Updated Phase 3 checklist to show exact import statements for both the library components and CSS file.

issues_found.description: File path inconsistency - 'Files to Modify' section used 'frontend/src/...' paths while Implementation Checklist used 'src/...' paths without frontend prefix, creating ambiguity about working directory context
issues_found.fix_applied: Added clarifying note at start of Implementation Checklist: 'Note: All paths below are relative to the frontend/ directory. Ensure you're in the frontend directory before starting implementation.'

issues_found.description: Dependencies structure not explicit - Research gotcha states 'Dependencies are defined as string array of task IDs' but spec didn't explicitly state the data type when describing GanttTask interface
issues_found.location: Phase 2: Type Definitions (line 262), Implementation Notes DO section
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated Phase 2 checklist to show full GanttTask interface signature including 'dependencies: string[]' type. Added explicit note: 'Note: dependencies is an array of task ID strings'. Added to DO section: 'Dependencies must be string arrays: dependencies: ["task-id-1", "task-id-2"]'

issues_found.description: ViewMode usage not clear - Spec mentioned 'Use ViewMode enum' but didn't show how to use it with examples (e.g., ViewMode.Day, ViewMode.Week)
issues_found.fix_applied: Updated DO section to show explicit ViewMode examples: 'Use ViewMode enum for zoom levels: ViewMode.Hour, ViewMode.Day, ViewMode.Week, ViewMode.Month, etc.' This provides clear usage pattern for developers.

critique_summary: Spec was generally well-written with correct technical details, but had 5 issues identified and fixed. Most critical was missing filter functionality that research identified from design reference. Other issues involved making import statements, type definitions, and API usage more explicit. All file path ambiguities were clarified with context notes. The spec now aligns fully with research findings and provides clear, unambiguous implementation guidance.
recommendations: Consider adding example code snippets showing complete GanttTask object structure with all required fields
Consider adding visual reference to exact design elements from 18-gantt-timeline.png that map to each functional requirement
When design reference image is available, verify filter button placement and styling requirements match research assumptions
